parameters.name: NumDatumTargetSym
parameters.description: Total number of datum target symbols on the drawing view

title: IView.IGetDatumTargetSyms
description: Gets all of the datum target symbols on this drawing view.

parameters.name: NumDatumTargetSym
parameters.description: Total number of datum target symbols on the drawing view

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of datum target symbols VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Use this method to obtain the array of datum target symbols all at once instead of calling
IView::GetFirstDatumTargetSym
and then repeatedly calling
IDatumTargetSym::GetNext
to obtain the remaining datum target symbols on this drawing view.
Before calling this method, call
IView::GetDatumTargetSymCount
to get the value for numDatumTargetSym.
